title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1/2 cup pasta water.
Fry pancetta in a pan until crispy. Add garlic if using, then remove garlic once fragrant.
In a bowl, whisk eggs with Parmesan cheese and a good amount of black pepper.
Drain spaghetti and add to the pan with pancetta. Remove from heat.
Quickly stir in the egg and cheese mixture, tossing until creamy. Add pasta water if needed.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through. Set aside.
In a pan, heat oil and sauté onions until golden. Add garlic and ginger.
Add tomatoes and cook for 10 minutes. Blend the sauce if smoother texture is desired.
Stir in cream and return chicken to the pan. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A Russian-inspired dish featuring tender beef strips cooked in a rich mushroom and sour cream sauce.
ingredients: 500g beef sirloin, sliced into thin strips
Cooked egg noodles or rice for serving
instructions: Season and dust beef strips with flour.
In a large pan, brown beef quickly in butter. Remove and set aside.
Sauté onions and mushrooms in the same pan until soft.
Add beef broth and mustard, simmer for 5 minutes.
Return beef to the pan, stir in sour cream, and heat gently (do not boil).
Serve over egg noodles or rice.

title: Pad Thai
summary: A flavorful Thai stir-fried noodle dish with shrimp, tofu, peanuts, bean sprouts, and tamarind sauce.
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water until soft, then drain.
Mix tamarind paste, fish sauce, and sugar to make sauce.
Heat oil in a wok, cook tofu until golden, then add shrimp.
Push ingredients to one side and scramble eggs in the pan.
Add noodles and sauce. Stir-fry everything together.
Toss in bean sprouts and green onions. Cook for 1 minute.
Serve with crushed peanuts and lime wedges.

title: Miso Ramen
summary: A Japanese noodle soup with a savory miso-based broth, topped with pork, egg, seaweed, and vegetables.
ingredients: Nori (seaweed), corn, and green onions for topping
instructions: In a pot, heat sesame oil and sauté garlic and ginger.
Add broth, soy sauce, and miso paste. Stir until miso dissolves. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Cook ramen noodles separately according to package instructions.
Place cooked noodles in a bowl. Pour over the hot broth.
Top with pork slices, boiled egg, nori, corn, and green onions.
Serve immediately.

title: Shakshuka
summary: A North African and Middle Eastern dish of poached eggs in a spicy tomato and pepper sauce.
ingredients: Fresh parsley or cilantro for garnish
instructions: Heat oil in a skillet. Sauté onion and bell pepper until soft.
Add garlic, cumin, paprika, and chili flakes. Cook for 1 minute.
Add tomatoes, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Make small wells in the sauce and crack eggs into each well.
Cover and cook until eggs are just set.
Garnish with parsley or cilantro. Serve with crusty bread.
